name: Shooter Tutorial
description:
This is the tutorial for the Shooter Project. I was unable to Download the WebGL file, as it froze my computer 3 times and I was running out of time.

Things I plan to add - 

  • New sprites Including background, player, enemies, and barriers
  • At least 5 Levels to the game
  • A Controls tab (Or at least a working one)
  • Music if I can figure out how to put it in the game
